full_summary:
**Handheld XRF Analyzer Tender**
=====================================

**Tender Notice**
----------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the procurement of Handheld XRF Analyzers.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3632083803
* **Publication Date**: August 29, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 28, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 21, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 14, 2024

**Procurement Method**
---------------------

This procurement will be conducted through a competitive tendering process.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contracting Entity**
----------------------

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity**
------------------

* **End User Entity Name**: Department of Health (HC)
* **End User Entity Address**: Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K9, Canada

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

* **Contact Name**: Lisa Golab
* **Contact Email**: lisa.golab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: Not available
* **Contact Fax**: Not available

**Notice URL**
----------------

The tender notice can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery website at:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13956493?extsite=MTM5NTY0OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Attachments**
----------------

None.

Note:

* All bids must be submitted on September 28, 2022, by 2:00 PM EDT.
* Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will be considered non-responsive.
* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to cancel or modify this tender at any time. The PSPC is not responsible for any errors or omissions in this notice. EOF
